110.title: Light sensor
110.description: The light sensor failed to initialize; please check the module integration and wiring.

111.title: Light sensor
111.description: The light sensor measurement is abnormal; please check the module integrity.

112.title: Light sensor
112.description: The light sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; please monitor the device's operation closely.

120.title: Weather sensor
120.description: The weather sensor failed to initialize; please check the module integration and wiring.

121.title: Weather sensor
121.description: The weather sensor measurement is abnormal; The ambient temperature is out of range.

122.title: Weather sensor
122.description: The weather sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The ambient temperature is exceeding safe threshold; please monitor the device's operation closely.

123.title: Weather sensor
123.description: The weather sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The ambient temperature is less than safe threshold; please monitor the device's operation closely.

124.title: Weather sensor
124.description: The weather sensor measurement is abnormal; The ambient humidity is out of range.

125.title: Weather sensor
125.description: The weather sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The ambient humidity is exceeding safe threshold; please monitor the device's operation closely.

126.title: Weather sensor
126.description: The weather sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The ambient humidity is below safe threshold; please monitor the device's operation closely.

127.title: Weather sensor
127.description: The weather sensor measurement is abnormal; The barometric pressure is out of range.

128.title: Weather sensor
128.description: The weather sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The barometric pressure is more than safe threshold; please monitor the device's operation closely.

129.title: Weather sensor
129.description: The weather sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The barometric pressure is less than safe threshold; please monitor the device's operation closely.

130.title: SD Card
130.description: The SD Card failed to initialize; please check the module integration and wiring.

131.title: SD Card
131.description: The SD Card failed to attatch; please check if the card is inserted properly.

132.title: SD Card
132.description: The SD Card failed to create log file; please check if the card is ok.

133.title: SD Card
133.description: The SD Card failed to write to the log file; please check if the card is ok.

140.title: AC Power sensor
140.description: The power sensor failed to initialize; please check the module integration and wiring.

141.title: AC Power sensor
141.description: The power sensor measurement is abnormal; The voltage reading is out of range.

142.title: AC Power sensor
142.description: The power sensor measurement is abnormal; The current reading is out of range.

143.title: AC Power sensor
143.description: The power sensor measurement is abnormal; The power reading is out of range.

144.title: AC Power sensor
144.description: The power sensor measurement is abnormal; The power factor and frequency reading is out of range.

145.title: AC Power sensor
145.description: The power sensor measurement is showing an overlimit; Please check the connected instruments.

150.title: Real Time Clock
150.description: The device timing information is incorrect; please update the device time manually. Any function that requires precise timing will malfunction!

210.title: Switch Relay
210.description: Switch number one is active, but the power sensor detects no power utilization. Please check the connected instrument to prevent failures.

211.title: Switch Relay
211.description: Switch number two is active, but the power sensor detects no power utilization. Please check the connected instrument to prevent failures.

212.title: Switch Relay
212.description: Switch number three is active, but the power sensor detects no power utilization. Please check the connected instrument to prevent failures.

213.title: Switch Relay
213.description: Switch number four is active, but the power sensor detects no power utilization. Please check the connected instrument to prevent failures.

214.title: Switch Relay
214.description: All switches are inactive, but the power sensor detects large power utilization. Please check the device relay module to prevent relay malfunction.

215.title: Switch Relay
215.description: Switch numner one is active for more than safe duration!

216.title: Switch Relay
216.description: Switch number two is active for more than safe duration!

217.title: Switch Relay
217.description: Switch number three is active for more than safe duration!

218.title: Switch Relay
218.description: Switch number four is active for more than safe duration!

220.title: IOExtender
220.description: The IOExtender failed to initialize; please check the module integration and wiring.

230.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
230.description: The TDS sensor failed to initialize; please check the ADS1115 module integration and wiring.

231.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
231.description: The TDS sensor measurement is abnormal; The TDS reading is out of range.

232.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
232.description: The TDS sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The TDS is exceeding safe threshold (water quality poor).

233.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
233.description: The TDS sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The TDS is below safe threshold (water too pure/unstable).

234.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
234.description: The EC sensor measurement is abnormal; The EC reading is out of range.

235.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
235.description: The EC sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The EC is exceeding safe threshold.

236.title: Water Quality Sensors (TDS/EC)
236.description: The EC sensor measurement is showing an extreme value; The EC is below safe threshold.

240.title: Water Temperature Sensor (DS18B20)
240.description: The water temperature sensor failed to initialize; please check the DS18B20 wiring and pull-up resistor.

241.title: Water Temperature Sensor (DS18B20)
241.description: The water temperature measurement is abnormal; The temperature reading is out of range.

242.title: Water Temperature Sensor (DS18B20)
242.description: The water temperature is exceeding safe threshold; Water may be too hot for intended use.

243.title: Water Temperature Sensor (DS18B20)
243.description: The water temperature is below safe threshold; Water may be too cold or frozen.
